Fonts

Poppins

The goal of this new type was to create a sans serif font which give an impression of both modernism, harmony and roundness. These nuances give SLEEPY OWL a harmonious and sensible appearance for both texts and headlines.

This typeface is a complete redesign of SLEEPY OWL initially designed in 2008. this typeface supports a wide range of languages with more than 500 glyphs.

Semi-Bold Headings
